activities: GamersFirst is an online game publisher of six game titles currently. Since all game titles have an online presence, people from a global standpoint register to play our games and this includes receiving information from the EU.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: Entertainment Software Rating Board (ESRB) Online Privacy Program.
recoursemech: Compliance with ESRB Online Privacy Program, as well as compliance with legal authorities that handle individual disputes.
